about_the_game:
Once the pet of an evil worshiper... Now adopted by an unlucky family!

The Parrot That Summons Demons is a family tragedy/horror FMV game featuring a surprisingly deep, dark and unsettling story by the creators of Bloody Service.



  • Cinematic Experience: Horror Visual Novel with full FMV support.
  • Multiple playable characters: Play the game from the perspective of any of the four members of the family.
  • Multiple Endings: Unlock every possible ending to understand more about your new pet and... Well, demons.
  • Innovative Inventory System: Slots used to keep items may have an impact on narrative outcomes.



The game is currently in development and this demo features two small chapters from Samantha’s timeline. Full game is going to feature multiple chapters for every member of the McCauley’s family.

What do you call a pentagram drawn by a parrot?
A star polly-gon.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, including Violence/Gore and use of illegal substances.

detailed_description:
Once the pet of an evil worshiper... Now adopted by an unlucky family!

The Parrot That Summons Demons is a family tragedy/horror FMV game featuring a surprisingly deep, dark and unsettling story by the creators of Bloody Service.



  • Cinematic Experience: Horror Visual Novel with full FMV support.
  • Multiple playable characters: Play the game from the perspective of any of the four members of the family.
  • Multiple Endings: Unlock every possible ending to understand more about your new pet and... Well, demons.
  • Innovative Inventory System: Slots used to keep items may have an impact on narrative outcomes.



The game is currently in development and this demo features two small chapters from Samantha’s timeline. Full game is going to feature multiple chapters for every member of the McCauley’s family.

What do you call a pentagram drawn by a parrot?
A star polly-gon.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04 and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04 and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mavericks 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mavericks 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+

name: The Parrot That Summons Demons Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Once the pet of an evil worshiper... Now adopted by an unlucky family! THE PARROT THAT SUMMONS DEMONS is a horror FMV visual novel featuring a dark and unsettling story with several playable characters and numerous endings.
